description: Numbers n such that n remains prime through 5 iterations of function f(x) = 2x + 7.
comments: n, 2*n+7, 4*n+21, 8*n+49, 16*n+105 and 32*n+217 are primes. [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
prog: (MAGMA) [n: n in [1..5000000] | IsPrime(n) and IsPrime(2*n+7) and IsPrime(4*n+21) and IsPrime(8*n+49) and IsPrime(16*n+105) and IsPrime(32*n+217)] [From _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 04 2010]
author: _David W. Wilson_
